frontmatter.title: On Not Being Afraid of Tech Debt
frontmatter.description: Highly-scaled distributed systems are a sum of moving pieces. That's not to mean they're unstable, they should not be, but rather that production is a surprising environment and a resilient system can't let tech debt be dead weight.
